Description: 10 beads in different shapes and material and one fragment of ostrich eggshell. A: Small fragment of ostrich eggshell broken into two fragments, very eroded on two edges, broken off at a third edge. B: Three segmented cylindrical beads made of white faience, all varying slightly in diameter. C: Three disc-shaped beads, two made of faience, one in vivid turquoise, the other in grey, the third one is made of ostrich eggshell and is partly weathered. D: Two short cylindrical beads, made of faience, one in white the other in light green faience. E: One extended spherical bead with an edge around the middle part, made of faience, no glaze preserved. F: One small and thin extended spherical bead made of white faience.
Acquisition notes: Formerly housed by the Birmingham Museum and Art Gallery and the EES London.
